```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(pacman)
library(readxl)
p_load(rprojroot)
root <- find_root(is_rstudio_project)

source(file.path(root, "Scripts/support/get_dataPath.r"))

p_load(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.width=12, fig.height=8,
  dpi = 300,
  echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE,
  #fig.path = file.path(root,"Fig_tab_map/out-"),
  fig.path = file.path(projectPath, paste0("GLOBIOM/Results/", globiom_file, "/out-")))

p_load(pander)
panderOptions('table.alignment.default', function(df)
    ifelse(sapply(df, is.numeric), 'right', 'left'))
panderOptions('table.split.table', Inf)
panderOptions('big.mark', ",")
panderOptions('keep.trailing.zeros', TRUE)
source(file.path(root, "Scripts/report_input/vision.R"))
#source(file.path(root, "Scripts/report_input/results.R"))
```
